worldview.title: 时代背景 (Era Background)
worldview.description: Set in 1994 Earth, appearing as a normal modern society with era-appropriate technology, but the underlying logic of societal operation is profoundly influenced by 魔女 and 魔力.

worldview.title: 隐藏的世界 (Hidden World)
worldview.description: 魔女, 巨猫, and related supernatural phenomena are secrets to the general public. Governments and special organizations (like 魔女之家) are aware and attempt to manage, research, or utilize this power, maintaining social stability and their own interests.

worldview.title: 魔女社会 (Mowu Society)
worldview.description: 魔女 are not a unified group; different organizations, factions, and philosophies exist. Some strive to integrate into society and hide their identities; some pursue power and explore the limits of 魔力; others drift on the fringes of society due to loss of control or discrimination.

worldview.title: 人与超自然 (Humans and the Supernatural)
worldview.description: Ordinary people have a vague perception of 异常现象, usually attributing them to myths, accidents, or mental issues. A gap exists between 魔女 and ordinary people, relationships are complex, potentially leading to friendship, love, or conflict due to misunderstanding or fear.

worldview.title: 力量的本质 (Nature of Power)
worldview.description: 魔力 stems from life and emotion, both a gift and a curse. It grants 魔女 extraordinary abilities but also brings mental burdens, the risk of losing control (畸变), and the fate of being drawn into supernatural struggles.
